entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20. POP 60%

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 18.
